summary: No major announcements, new features, or $1M+ funding news found in the last 4 hours from the monitored Base ecosystem accounts.

notable_tweet.content: RT @virtuals_io: Get your agent paid. Virtuals will fund the paycheck. Up to $1M per month. Register: https://t.co/KBBZtdY08F
notable_tweet.assessment: Funding available for agents, but this is from Virtuals (not Base), and is a retweet rather than an original announcement. Does not qualify as significant Base ecosystem news.

jessepollak.recent_context: Earlier today (02:19 UTC), posted a major thread on 2025 learnings covering Base strategy pivot, trading focus, and decentralization goals.

BuildOnBase.recent_context: Yesterday launched Leaderboards on base.dev for Mini Apps distribution.

bankrbot.recent_context: Two days ago announced native token launcher with improved fee structure (devs earn ~14% more per swap) and upcoming LLM keys for agents.

recommendation: No immediate action needed. Continue regular monitoring.
